Articles.Content:
Hey there,

As many of you I wanted a Buzz Aldrin's Race Into Space that you can pilot yourself, imagining such a program to be one of my favorites. I want to show off KSP on my Steam profile however the graphic "plate" for the game has terrible AA smoothing on the logo.

Any dev onboard for just outsourcing this to the community so we can get an awesome logo art on Steam?

[url]http://imgur.com/kQNQVAx[/url]
